abstract: New York State Senate does not confirm any of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's nominees for Metropolitan Transportation Authority board, and only confirms one of Gov Andrew Cuomo's two picks, Lawrence S Schwartz.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence S. Schwartz was chosen over Mayor Bill de Blasio’s three recommendations.

headline.main: State Senate Confirms Former Cuomo Aide to Serve on M.T.A. Board
headline.print_headline: 1 of 4 Nominees Is Confirmed to M.T.A. Board

snippet: Lawrence S. Schwartz was chosen over Mayor Bill de Blasio’s three recommendations.
